page.title: 17A DAY IN THE LIFE OF MY MUM
page.content: My mum gets up,puts on her dressing gown and goes downstairs. She goes into the kitchen,makes breakfast and prepares our sandwiches. After breakfast she washes up and cleans the kitchen. She stands by the door nd waves goodbye to my dad,my older sister and myself. She then gets the vacuum cleaner out and cleans the house. After she has cleaned she gets ready to meet her friends to play badminton. After her game she goes to the shops and gets the shopping. When she returns home she puts everything away and goes and sits down. Later she makes dinner, welcomes us home, and after the meal has been eaten and the kitchen cleaned she goes to the lounge to watch television until it is time for bed.
